record.jsxtip: fires when the value of the field changes through user interaction
fires when the user types text into the date field and before the change event

record.jsxreturntext: specifies the parsed date, in which case the input text is not parsed by the date format

record.jsxtext: the text entered by the user
record.jsxreturntext: modifies the text entered by the user before it is parsed by the date format

record.jsxtip: fires when the calendar is revealed

record.jsxreturntext: specifies the year and month to display upon opening the calendar

record.jsxtip: fires when the calendar is hidden
fires before a context menu is shown

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu

record.jsxtip: fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
